messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: CentCom airlock control override activated. Please take this time to get acquainted with your coworkers.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: CentCom airlock control override activated. Please take this time to get acquainted with your coworkers.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Space Station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failure imminent. Please contact you*%fj00)`5vc-BZZT
